titleStmt.title: Sundrie nevv and artificiall remedies against famine. Written by H.P. Esq. vppon thoccasion of this present dearth
titleStmt.author: Plat, Hugh, Sir, 1552-1611?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by P[eter] S[hort] dwelling on Breadstreet hill, at the signe of the Starre,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: New remedies against famine.
